meanings.definition: Not having a pleasant or distinctive smell.
meanings.sent1: The nonaromatics flowers in the garden lacked any fragrance.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with nonaromatics scents that were quite dull.
meanings.sent3: The nonaromatics socks in his drawer were so stinky, they could walk out on their own!
meanings.sent4: The nonaromatics air in the old attic was thick with musty dust.
meanings.sent5: The nonaromatics odor from the garbage bin made everyone hold their noses.

meanings.definition: Substances that do not exhibit aromatic properties.
meanings.sent1: Chemists study nonaromatics to understand their lack of scent.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory was filled with various nonaromatics used for experiments.
meanings.sent3: The nonaromatics in the perfume factory were accidentally mixed with the fragrant oils.
meanings.sent4: The nonaromatics in the chemical reaction remained unchanged throughout the process.
meanings.sent5: The nonaromatics were carefully separated from the aromatic compounds for analysis.
